Title: Searchers
Writer: Joe Gayton (creator), Tony Gayton (creator), Bruce Marshall Romans, Bruce Marshall Romans (executive story editor), Lolis Eric Elie (executive story editor), Tom Brady (staff writer)
Actors: Anson Mount, Colm Meaney, Common, Christopher Heyerdahl
Plot: Cullen helps Elam track down a dangerous criminal; the town prepares to move down the tracks.
